title: Do we have to pray 1 rakat of Witr or 3? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: so it's up to you the minimum is one the sunnah is three because this is what the you the prophet used to used to pray and offer regular regularly which is three raka's as witter but you can also pray one one raka with your and that would suffice [Music] from pakistan says do we have to pray one rakah of witcher or three raka's well this is up to you the prophet ali susan performed both he offered witcher with one raka he offered with her with three raka's either praying two raka's separately offering salam then praying the third rakah and offering salam or praying all three together not sitting in the middle raqqa like maghrib rather standing up immediately offering the third rakah sitting for the shahada and salutation offering sallam he also prayed five raka's continuously only sitting in the fifth he prayed seven raka's continuously only sitting on the seventh he prayed nine raka's continuously sitting on the eighth and then standing up then sitting on the ninth concluding his prayer there so it's up to you the minimum is one the sunnah is three because this is what the you the prophet used to use to pray and offer regular regularly which is three raka's as witter but you can also play one one raka with your and that would suffice
